textAfterTable: 11 Songs Customer Reviews Band : HUNTER VALENTINE           by Deborah downtown The band "Hunter Valentine" is the sexyist girl band I've ever heard, just check out the lead singer Kiyomi!! Ooo lala. Biography Formed: 2004 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada Genre: Alternative Years Active: '00s, '10s Fiery Canadian all-female hard rock outfit Hunter Valentine was formed in 2004 by guitarist/vocalist Kiyomi McCloskey, bassist Adrienne Lloyd, and drummer Laura Petracca. Drawing on influences like the Pretenders, Janis Joplin, Loverboy, and Muse, the band turned heads in Southern Ontario with its 2005 self-financed debut EP, which led to a record deal with True North, who delivered the group's first full-length outing, 2007's The Impatient Romantic.
